Fairview Families,

Due to guidance received today from the Governor’s Office and the Kentucky Department of Education regarding delaying the scheduled start date of districts based on the increased number of cases in our state, the Fairview Independent will delay our start date to August 27, 2020. We will start under the same schedule outlined in our reopening plan for the start date for students based on grade and option. Please add exactly two weeks to the schedule in the plan. For example, K and 6th grade only will start in-person classes on August 27, 2020 with students at other grade levels phasing in as outlined in the chart in our reopening plan.

We understand plans being announced as “at this time” is challenging for you. Please know that we are doing everything that we can to be consistent, effective, and efficient in our planning as we do our best to respond to this situation and continue to focus our number one priority on keeping our students, staff, families, and community safe and healthy.

Volunteers Needed!

We are in need of volunteers to participate in our district volunteer program. Volunteers will provide two areas of service: 1) Additional sanitation of school facilities throughout the school day, or 2) Conduct student temperature checks upon loading of school buses and arrival at school.

All volunteers in our volunteer program go through an extensive background check, receive training, and are under the direct supervision of school personnel at all times. Volunteers will work with district staff to choose a set weekly schedule that can range from as little as a couple of hours one day weekly to a couple of hours five days weekly. The schedule will need to be set in advance though to allow efficiency and effectiveness in planning.

If you are interested in volunteering, please email our superintendent at jackie.risden-smith@fairview.kyschools.us and include your phone number.

Fairview Family, please consider liking and/or sharing this post so that the Facebook algorithm allows more people to see this post.
